meanings.definition: A synthetic resin or plastic consisting of polyvinyl chloride or a related polymer, used especially for wallpapers and other covering materials and for phonograph records.
meanings.sent1: I bought some colorful vinyl to decorate my room.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of vinyl wallpapers for home decor.
meanings.sent3: When the vinyl wallpaper started talking, I knew it was time for bed.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a roll of vibrant vinyl, unrolling endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh vinyl filled the room as we redecorated.

meanings.sent1: My dad's old vinyl collection includes classic records.
meanings.sent2: We enjoy listening to music on vintage vinyl records.
meanings.sent3: The vinyl records had a dance party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His voice was like a scratched vinyl, repeating the same old stories.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the needle hitting the vinyl was music to my ears.
